"It's not about being able to do it, it's about finding your own unique way to approach it."
"Perhaps you're trying too hard or putting too much pressure on yourself. Relax and try again."
"Maybe you need to break down the task into smaller, more manageable steps."
"Consider seeking help or guidance from someone else who may have experience with this task."
"Remember, everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses. Find what works best for you and focus on that."
